Note: Initials "NBT" in a circle appear on left near bottom. Date of issue based on date of Third Liberty Loan campaign. Orientation:  Vertical.
Description: Two hats are pictured side by side.  One is Uncle Sam's American top hat turned upside down containing five third issue Liberty bonds. The other is a German military helmet. Text says "Which?" "United Cigars" symbol appears on upper right of poster.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Third issue Liberty Bond
